name: Modern Car Driving:City Street
description:
Modern Car Driving: City Street!!!
The real raceis starting now and here is your chance to be on the top rider list. Test your driving skills in a real city-based environment. Your goal in the racing challenge is not backward, to defeat your opponent's car over all vehicles and to prove who is the king of road racing. Fast race from now on, the is your chance in busy traffic. Test your driving skills. In a real game environment, it is to speed up your car beyond other vehicles on the road,

Features:
- realistic map scene
- Fun and challenging game
- Real environmental effects
- Realistic automotive physics
- Simple operation
- Perfect 3D graphics
